actionTemplate.title: Assign roles in a 9-pan eyeshadow palette
steps: Use a light matte shade to set the lid and eye socket
Place your main color on the mobile lid
Use shimmer to brighten center of lid and inner corner
Blend crease with a medium matte to soften transitions
Deepen outer corner with a dark shade; optional: use matte brown as shadow liner

rationaleTemplate: Role-based mapping makes any palette easier to use
Layering from light to dark builds depth cleanly
